definition[0]: to open something that is tied, fastened, or wrapped
example[0]: The screws can be undone by hand.
definition[1]: to try to remove the bad effects of something you have done
example[3]: We cannot undo the damage of a lifetime in only 30 days.
example[4]: If a medicine is taken again too soon, it may undo all the good that has been done.
definition[2]: to remove the effect of your previous action on a computer
